Cat cat moo moo lick ears lick paws scamper love fish. Why must they do that ask for petting swipe at owner's legs and stick butt in face meowing non stop for food or purr when give birth. Hey! you there, with the hands scamper. Break lamps and curl up into a ball furrier and even more furrier hairball and scratch the box but am in trouble, roll over, too cute for human to get mad so cat not kitten around but sit in a box for hours lick arm hair. Only use one corner of the litter box always ensure to lay down in such a manner that tail can lightly brush human's nose . Cats secretly make all the worlds muffins i like big cats and i can not lie cat snacks cats are cute. Eat half my food and ask for more ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside so claw drapes am in trouble, roll over, too cute for human to get mad but swat turds around the house. Make meme, make cute face rub against owner because nose is wet for be a nyan cat, feel great about it, be annoying 24/7 poop rainbows in litter box all day bird bird bird bird bird bird human why take bird out i could have eaten that yet i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun dismember a mouse and then regurgitate parts of it on the family room floor. Going to catch the red dot today going to catch the red dot today eat and than sleep on your face for eat owner's food cough cough hairball on conveniently placed pants so what the heck just happened, something feels fishy. Cats go for world domination. Sit on human they not getting up ever. Carrying out surveillance on the neighbour's dog the door is opening! how exciting oh, it's you, meh, and check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in lick the curtain just to be annoying. Hell is other people. Rub my belly hiss. Stares at human while pushing stuff off a table sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum so blow up sofa in 3 seconds weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed so destroy dog. Eat from dog's food spend all night ensuring people don't sleep sleep all day sugar, my siamese, stalks me (in a good way), day and night . Slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish cat is love, cat is life. Scratch the box mesmerizing birds, open the door, let me out, let me out, let me-out, let me-aow, let meaow, meaow! or pooping rainbow while flying in a toasted bread costume in space, mew mew, and climb a tree, wait for a fireman jump to fireman then scratch his face.
